short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically apply RTL text direction for builder text blocks on ManyChat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ManyChat RTL Text Direction Extension is an essential tool for anyone who manages multilingual content on ManyChat. This extension lets users seamlessly switch between right-to-left (RTL) and left-to-right (LTR) text directions, making it ideal for creating content in languages such as Arabic, Hebrew, and other RTL scripts. With just one click, you can adapt text layouts on ManyChat's builder to suit different language requirements without the hassle of manual adjustments.

Whether youâ€™re a developer, designer, content creator, or social media manager, this extension will enhance your productivity and improve text layout accuracy in ManyChat. Perfect for businesses, marketers, and international teams who work with multilingual and international audiences, the ManyChat RTL Text Direction Extension simplifies text alignment across languages. Make your ManyChat experience more accessible, user-friendly, and efficient!
